content: velostatīvi vs pludmale

Seen something similar, but I think with outdoor training equipment at beach near Vecāķi. But in couple months it was accessible again.
Does somebody dig those up, or is this something naturally occurring at sea beaches?

Sand level can change by many metres naturally. If there are changes that significantly affect wind/sand accumulation, like walls, I seem to recall several floor worth of sand accumulating in a few years.
Maybe some items (like equipment) get cleared or otherwise made accessible, but not sure about that.
